Text: Thank you for uploading science books, this one in particular is brilliant :) Is there anyway you can upload "Lone Survivors: How We Came to Be the Only Humans on Earth" by Chris Stringer.

Duplicate of  http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6930129/Coyne_-_Why_Evolution_Is_True_-_eBook

Why posting duplicates to low volume torrents?

How much did you save them by zipping the file?
Unless you want to pack some ads with the upload (against the rules?) I see only infinitesimal use in lossless compression of 2-MB books...
